formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: US gal = hogshead × HHDUS Imp gal = hogshead × HHDIMP Example: 1.5 hogshead × 63 US gal = 94.5 US gal

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: hogshead = gallons ÷ hogshead_size Example: 200 US gal ÷ 63 ≈ 3.1746 hogsheads
